public static class {Singular}QueryMapping
{
	public static IQueryable<{Singular}QueryResult> To{Singular}QueryResult(this IQueryable<{Singular}Query> {PluralizeVar})
	{
		return {PluralizeVar}.Select(c => new {Singular}QueryResult

			Id = c.Id, //Complete the properties.
		});
	}
	public static IEnumerable<{Singular}QueryResult> To{Singular}QueryResult(this IEnumerable<{Singular}Query> {PluralizeVar})
	{
		return {PluralizeVar}.Select(c => new {Singular}QueryResult
		{
			Id = c.Id, //Complete the properties.
		});
	}
}
